DOC.brief_summary: Functional Magnetic Stimulation ( FMS ) appear modulate autonomic somatic nervous system innervate low urinary tract . Stimulation pudendal afferent nerve near third sacral root induces relaxation detrusor muscle reinforcement urethral sphincter . Some preliminary study indicate positive effect FMS stress urinary incontinence . Investigators aim evaluate immediate long-term effect method stress urinary incontinent patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Functional Magnetic Stimulation Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: 5 Hz repetitive magnetic stimulation apply bilateral sacral root 20 minute .
DOC.criteria: Urine incontinence refractory traditional treatment Arrhythmia , pacemaker implantation
